titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: DEATH CAUSE ICD CODE (DURING NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE PERIOD) - Description

div.p: DEATH CAUSE ICD CODE (DURING NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE PERIOD) is the same as attribute CLINICAL CLASSIFICATION CODE.

DEATH CAUSE ICD CODE (DURING NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE PERIOD) is the International Classification of Diseases (ICD) code describing the reason for the death of a baby during a Neonatal CRITICAL CARE PERIOD.
